author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In Gaza, on the eve of a moonless night,
The quest to free hostages, embarks in spite,
Of anger, distrust, and confusion's blight,
In mazes of rancor, no end in sight.

Faith in death toll reports, does U.S instate,
Trust in Palestinian data's fate,
A move by Biden's rule to reciprocate,
In Gaza's bleak hours, progress shall wait.

Now heed the Bard, for I've much to impart,
In choosing glass frame, reveals one's heart,
Crucial decisions made at year's start,
Guard against errors, let wise style impart.

feedItems.title: Push to Free Israeli Hostages in Gaza Hindered by Mistrust, Anger, Confusion
feedItems.description: Talks to release hostages have been complicated from the start by hostility between Israel and Hamas, as well as rivalries among Arab countries seeking to mediate.

feedItems.title: U.S. Officials Have Growing Confidence in Death Toll Reports From Gaza
feedItems.description: The reliance on Palestinian data is a partial shift by the Biden administration.

feedItems.title: Choosing Glasses Is the Most Important Style Decision You'll Make All Year. Don't Mess It Up.
feedItems.description: Though specs can define your look, so many people wear ill-suited frames. How to avoid mistakes and find a great, flattering pair.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In archipelago's embrace, a tussle unfolds,
'Neath the veil of azure skies and beaches of gold.
India and China, their rivalry takes a hold,
On Maldivian sands, a tale of power told.

Changes stir upon the wind, in the East held tight,
Farmers frantically replant, by the dragon's might.
Fear arises 'nigh, in the heart of the night,
For if China stays not, what becomes of their plight?

Beyoncé, Ellison, in Rappaport's golden sphere,
Where superbrokers operate, both far and near.
He stakes as he speaks, though the end draws near,
A court's verdict echoes, bearing potential fear.

feedItems.title: India, China Fight for Influence Over Tiny Archipelago Nation
feedItems.description: The fierce rivalry between the Asian powers is on display in the Maldives, better known for its white sand beaches and crystal clear waters than as a strategic military outpost.

feedItems.title: As Chinese Tastes Change, Farmers Everywhere Rip Up and Replant
feedItems.description: The windfall is transforming entire regions, but some are starting to worry: What if China stops buying?

feedItems.title: Beyoncé and Jay-Z Are Clients, So Too Larry Ellison: How a Superbroker Operates
feedItems.description: Kurt Rappaport explains how a court verdict could upend the business for others; ‘I put my money where my mouth is.’

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In halls of Asgard, to the godly perch,
Fell Karen Davis, woman of worth, valiant in her work,
She battled for the fowls 'neath the Midgard's skies,
Seventy-nine winters, before her final sun did arise.

Upon Vegas' golden shore, where luck and silver intertwine,
Three wager houses and workers struck a pact, their strife now left behind.
Dodged a strike, as a spear thrown by Thor, the conflict ceased,
A peaceful settlement, a war narrowly appeased.

In the land of Stars and Stripes, chaos did unfold,
China's mightiest bank's offspring hit by cyber serpents bold.
A ransom, cruel as Fenrir's bite, in the market left a scar,
'Twas an ill-fated day, under Odin's watchful star.

feedItems.title: Died: Karen Davis, campaigner for the rights of poultry, 79.
feedItems.description: Died: Karen Davis, campaigner for the rights of poultry, 79.

feedItems.title: Las Vegas Strip casino workers and three gambling companies reached labor contract deals this past week, narrowly avoiding a strike.
feedItems.description: Las Vegas Strip casino workers and three gambling companies reached labor contract deals this past week, narrowly avoiding a strike.

feedItems.title: A U.S. subsidiary of China's biggest bank was the victim of a ransomware attack on Wednesday, threatening a temporary logjam for some trades in the Treasury bond market.
feedItems.description: A U.S. subsidiary of China’s biggest bank was the victim of a ransomware attack on Wednesday, threatening a temporary logjam for some trades in the Treasury bond market.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Oh, Harbaugh, from games thou art barred,
For rules of fair play thou hast marred.
Into the chill, like mead most sour,
Thy season ends, in NCAA's hour.

O'er Gaza's field, Israeli might,
Advanced with swift and surprising delight.
Yet complexities lie in the path hence to tread,
Like strong ale in a monk's convoluted head.

From Detroit’s gain, Honda takes cue,
An eleventh part added to workers' due.
Like the best wine after a long pious fast,
Sweet is the reward when the hardship is past.

feedItems.title: The Big Ten Conference barred Michigan football coach Jim Harbaugh for the rest of the regular season games amid an NCAA investigation into cheating allegations.
feedItems.description: The Big Ten Conference barred Michigan football coach Jim Harbaugh for the rest of the regular season games amid an NCAA investigation into cheating allegations.

feedItems.title: Israeli ground forces have fought their way into northern Gaza's urban areas with a speed that has surprised even their own commanders, but the most complex stages of the war might still lie ahead.
feedItems.description: Israeli ground forces have fought their way into northern Gaza’s urban areas with a speed that has surprised even their own commanders, but the most complex stages of the war might still lie ahead.

feedItems.title: Honda is giving many U.S. factory workers an 11% pay bump following major gains secured by the UAW in Detroit last month.
feedItems.description: Honda is giving many U.S. factory workers an 11% pay bump following major gains secured by the UAW in Detroit last month.
